meanings.definition: A person who plays the game of craps.
meanings.sent1: The crapshooters gathered around the craps table, eager to roll the dice.
meanings.sent2: The casino was filled with enthusiastic crapshooters trying their luck at the game.
meanings.sent3: The crapshooters joked and laughed as they placed their bets on the craps table.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gambling, crapshooters are the risk-takers who believe in their luck.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crapshooters huddled around the craps table was etched in his memory.
